title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:modify_slipperiness'
- Adjusts your friction, allowing you to emulate or counter the effects of ice blocks under certain conditions.

block_condition.description: If specified, the modifier(s) will only apply to the blocks that fulfills this condition.

modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to the entity's slipperiness.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to the entity's slipperiness.
